definitions.definition: form the population of (a town, area, or country).
examples: the island is populated by scarcely 40,000 people
synonyms: reside in "the town is populated by 40

definitions.definition: cause people to settle in (an area or place).
examples: Finland pursues a policy designed to populate its Russian borders
synonyms: make one's home in "an attempt to populate the island"

definitions.definition: fill or be present in (a place, environment, or domain).
examples: the spirit of the book and the characters who populate its pages

definitions.definition: add data to a previously empty section of (an electronic form, document, etc.).
examples: use scripts to populate the graph with data
